markdown:
Azarketis with more adventurous spirits often learn the art of sailing and join the crew of a ship. Such sailors get to enjoy their time above deck while also having near-constant access to large bodies of water. Ship captains also appreciate having azarketis on board, as they're able to easily scrape barnacles off the hull, check the rudder, and help patch any leaks. Though they have a talent for swimming more than sailing, they've earned a reputation as lucky to have on board. **[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 16 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 14 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 11 [Azarketi Sailor](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1748) **Source** [Absalom, City of Lost Omens](/Sources.aspx?ID=108) pg. 396 **Perception** +8 **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +8, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +7, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +5, [Sailing Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +6, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +8 **Str** +3 **Dex** +4 **Con** +2 **Int** +0 **Wis** +1 **Cha** +1 **Items** [Composite Longbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=74) (20 arrows), [Scimitar](/Weapons.aspx?ID=38), studded leather --- **AC** 18 **Fort** +8 **Ref** +11 **Will** +5 **HP** 30 **Hydration** Azarketi must regularly submerge themselves in water to rehydrate their water-acclimated skin. After the first 24 hours outside of water, they gain a –1 status penalty to Fortitude saves as their skin cracks and their gills become painful. After 48 hours, they struggle to breathe air and begin to [suffocate](/Rules.aspx?ID=468) until returned to water
**Sea Legs** ([fortune](/Traits.aspx?ID=76)) An azarketi sailor gains a +1 circumstance bonus to [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) checks to [Balance](/Actions.aspx?ID=28) and can roll twice and take the better result on checks to Balance while aboard a ship.
**Submerged Stealth** While submerged in water, an azarketi crab catcher gains a +2 circumstance bonus on their [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) check, indicated above. --- **Speed** 25 feet; swim 25 feet **Melee** scimitar +9 ([Forceful](/Traits.aspx?ID=180), [Sweep](/Traits.aspx?ID=194)), **Damage** 1d6+5 slashing **Ranged** composite longbow +10 ([deadly d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [range increment 100 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [volley](/Traits.aspx?ID=201)), **Damage** 1d8+1 piercing **Swinging Strike** ([Move](/Traits.aspx?ID=114)) **Requirement** The azarketi sailor is hanging from a rope or vine; **Effect** The azarketi sailor swings a distance equal to up to twice their Speed, moving in a straight line, and makes a single Strike at any point during the movement.
name: Azarketi Sailor
